summary: Craftable version of the normally unplayable \'Black Mage Hood\' in several color variations
descriptionHtml:
Craftable Hoods vers. 1.2

Description:
A simple mod to add a wearable version of the \'Black Mage Hood\' which is normally hidden from the player, in eleven color variations (Black, Darker Black, White, Brown, Blue, Purple, Green, Grey, Red, Orange, Yellow).  Also adds separate Archmage and Thalmor hoods.  Find the recipies at the forge in the \'Misc\' catagory.

Recommended: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7696]Armored Circlets by QuickFox[/url] - can be worn under the hoods to give the protection of helmets

Installation:
Just extract to \\Skyrim\\Data

Known Issues/Conflicts:
I use the vanilla mesh from the game, which has some clipping issues with a lot of armors.
The Archmage and Thalmor hoods look identical to the grey monk hood when you throw them on the ground or in your inventory.

Changelog:

  1.2:
    -  Added Darker Black, White, Purple, and Orange color variations.
  1.1:
    - Added Archmage and Thalmor hoods.
    - Added Yellow Color hoods.
  1.0:
    - Fixed so beast races get different colors too, not just black.
    - Tweaked recipies a little.
    - Reduced Value of hoods.
    - Changed names from \'<color> Hood\' to \'Hood (<color>)\' so that they all sort together.

  0.9:
    - Initial Version
author: Jadak
